text: William Sanderson (born January 10, 1944) is an American actor, known for his work in such feature movies as Blade Runner (1982) and in such television series as Newhart (1982–1990), Deadwood (2004–2006, 2019), and True Blood (2008–2010, 2012). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Memphis, Tennessee
title: William Sanderson
